mapper.select: select count(*) count from site_inst where fieldId =#{field.id}

select
from site_inst where loginstatus=1 and manufacturer=0

select
from site_inst
1=1
and site_inst.site_Hum_id=#{siteInst.Site_Hum_Id}
AND (FieldID =(SELECT id FROM field WHERE groupId =#{siteInst.FieldID}) or FieldID in (select id from field WHERE parentid = (select id from field WHERE groupId =#{siteInst.FieldID})))
mapper.update: update site_inst set loginstatus=#{loginState} where CellDescribe=#{ip}
mapper.select: select loginstatus from site_inst where site_inst_id=#{siteId}

mapper.select: select FieldID from site_inst where site_Hum_id=#{humId}

select count(s.CellType) neCount,createtime,site_inst_id,Site_Hum_Id,CellDescribe , CellId,CellType,CellEditon,CellIcccode,CellTPoam,CellTimeZone,CellTime,CellTimeServer, CellIdentifier,FieldID,SiteX,SiteY,Type,Swich,username,userpwd,loginstatus,versions,isGateway , siteType ,manufacturer,isCreateDiscardFlow ,createUser ,location,sn , rootIP,alarmReversalModel,isAlarmReversal,isDelayAlarmTrap,delayTime , rack,shelf ,rebootTime from site_inst s group by s.CellType

select
from site_inst
where FieldID in(select id from field where netWorkId in(select field_id FROM user_field where user_id =#{userInst.User_Id}))
